column2:
"Hey, <%me>.
You've been taking a lot of quests. Do you have any specific goal in mind?"
"Nah, you don't have to tell me if you don't want to. Everyone has their reasons."
"Some people join just for the prestige that comes with being an ARKS member. I guess that's not too bad a reason."

"That's actually pretty simple...
It was the only option available."
"...Well, whatever your reasons are, just be careful out there. You only have one life."
